title: Espa At The Ritz-Carlton, Macau Picks Up First-Class Honor In Spa China Award 2015
text:
Email 
ESPA at The Ritz-Carlton, Macau was awarded ‘Best Spa Design of the Year’ last Thursday at the 6 th SpaChina Awards – a prestigious industry event hosted by SpaChina Magazine at The Ritz-Carlton, Tianjin on September 10, 2015. A panel of judges including senior spa consultants and managers from China, Hong Kong and Macau, as well as website-votes cast the decision for the winning spa. ESPA stood out among other nominees for its intricate and thoughtful designs that infuse elements rooted in traditional Chinese and Portuguese architecture, reflecting the unique character of Macau. 
“We have recently celebrated 100 days since the opening of The Ritz-Carlton, Macau on May 27. The high recognition from SpaChina Awards is a wonderful testament to the hard work of the Ladies and Gentlemen at ESPA,” said Rauf Malik, Vice President of Operations for JW Marriott Hotel Macau and The Ritz-Carlton, Macau. “The achievement truly echoes the service philosophy of our company, to provide the finest personal service and facilities for our guests to ensure they enjoy a warm, relaxed, yet refined ambience.” ESPA - Relaxation Room Spa China Award 2015 - ESPA at The Ritz-Carlton, Macau The Ritz-Carlton Macau_ESPA_Couples Treatment Room The Ritz-Carlton, Macau_ESPA_Vitality Pool
